articles.title: Li Jinglei hit by backlash in Wang Leehom saga; good friend Patty Hou becomes unexpected target - AsiaOne
articles.description: If you thought 2021 marked the end of the Wang Leehom-Li Jinglei divorce saga, think again. Only this time, the tide appears to have turned — in Leehom's favour. According to Taiwan media reports, the "whitewashing" of the Mandopop singer's misdeeds in recent…
articles.content:
If you thought 2021 marked the end of the Wang Leehom-Li Jinglei divorce saga, think again. Only this time, the tide appears to have turned  in Leehom's favour.
